msg: and an simple type handler change sample

author: amilas
msg: add a simpleTypehandler support so that users can give a custom simple type handler
if they want to change the defult serializing and deserializing

author: slaws
msg: Check that an output type exists before resetting its databinding

author: slaws
msg: Add in second sca binding to a service when there is the potential for remote connections. This new binding will give rise to a wire separate from the local sca binding wire so that both local and remote references can target the same component through the sca binding.
